name: Outers
description:
Note: if the game blank after you press "Play Game", please reload to fix the problem.

Hello, this is my first game jam project for Beginners Circle Jam#3. I'm sorry if this game is bad.

The Story of Outers is as The Explorer, You found a Planet and try to live on that planet using by any means.

Use W,A,S,D to move and mouse to shoot and choose option.

Thank you for playing!
